hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# hoards #a Bomb Bag#.
hinted_locations: Dodongos Cavern GS Vines Above Stairs

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that slaying #100 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: Why are you asking me? I don't have any answers! I'm just as confused as you are!

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that the #Light Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Volvagia# holds...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #Cojiro#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #the Mirror Shield# can be found at #Gerudo Valley#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that slaying #100 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that #the Death Mountain Crater# is on the path of #Skulls#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #a Piece of Heart#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #Bombs (5 pieces)# can be found in #the Market#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that the #Spirit Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that plundering #the Desert Colossus# is a foolish choice.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #a Piece of Heart#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that #the Bolero of Fire# can be found in #the Market#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that the #rainbow bridge# leads to #the Fire Temple#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that plundering #Lon Lon Ranch# is a foolish choice.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that inside #Jabu Jabu#, one can find #the Bottom of the Well#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that the Groose is loose.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# has #6# major items.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that #the Bottom of the Well# is on the path of #Skulls#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well Compass Chest

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that #the Lost Woods# is on the way of the hero.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #Arrows (10 pieces)# and #the Serenade of Water#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that plundering #Zora's Fountain# is a foolish choice.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that #the Graveyard# has #2# major items.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that a #heavy pillar# outside the castle obstructs the #Carpenters' tent#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# hoards #a Gold Skulltula Token#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Spirit Trial Crystal Switch Chest

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that #Hyrule Field# is on the path of #Skulls#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that at the #Bombchu Bowling Alley#, you will be rewarded with...^ #a Red Rupee# and #the Hover Boots#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Huge Rupee#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Maze Path Third Chest

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #a Purple Rupee#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that unfreezing #King Zora# grants #a Piece of Heart#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that the #Goron Pot's happy face# spits out #Deku Seeds (30 pieces)#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Huge Rupee#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.
